Senior Backend Software Engineer: Node.js

Join one of the most promising blockchain companies to transform and upgrade financial markets, making transfers of value quick, easy, and secure.

About Tokeny

At Tokeny, we are recognized as a global Blockchain50 company and backed by Euronext, Inveniam, Apex Group and K20 Fund. Over $28 billion worth of assets has already been tokenized via our solutions. We provide an enterprise-grade tokenization platform for financial actors to compliantly issue, transfer and manage securities using distributed ledger technology, enabling them to improve asset liquidity.

Due to the over-centralization of the current finance technical infrastructure, it is complicated for investors to find private markets opportunities, to access them, and to manage their portfolio. There is indeed a very poor asset transferability with little to no liquidity. By applying trust, compliance and control on a hyper-efficient infrastructure, Tokeny enables market participants to unlock significant advancements in the transferability and liquidity of financial instruments.

Are you interested in accelerating the digitalization of financial markets via blockchain technology? Join Tokeny to make history!

Top Reasons to Work with Us
  • 🤑 Fully funded company with an existing ecosystem of customers (50+) and partners
  • 🌏 Human-sized international company with 10+ different nationalities
  • 🔥 Be part of an ultra-talented, experienced & highly productive, passionate team
  • 🚀 Great growth potential and a focus on innovation
  • 🖥 Remote, Hybrid, Asynchronous environment that adapts to you
  • 🛋 Flexible WFH policies and great benefits
  • 🤗 Strong agility and quality culture with a unique vision
  • 🍻 Regular team-building activities & special work events and traditions
  • 💰 Year-end bonuses and other financial compensations
  • 📈 Active Employee Stock Options plan
  • 🗣 Company sponsored tech talks and happy hours
  • ⛓ Contribute to open source projects
  • 🧠 Peer to peer learning and in-company tech brainstorm groups
  • 🤝 Senior dev mentoring program
  • 🧑‍💻 Hackathons participation

Job description

We are looking for an engineer to work on a set of cloud-based services and blockchain applications. You should be  comfortable contributing to existing backend APIs as well as creating new applications from scratch, following best practices and patterns to deliver clean and scalable architectures.

As a Senior Software Engineer, you will work on all aspects of our backend: APIs, docker, databases, serverless functions, AWS cloud, blockchain interfaces…

You should be familiar with current web frameworks, modern container-based event-driven architectures.

We expect you to actively contribute to the betterment of Tokeny’s products, feedback, tech design discussions  and improvements in all aspects of the development are encouraged and welcomed.

Responsibilities
  • Lead by example with work ethic and ownership of results
  • Address complex architectural problems with simple, intuitive designs
  • Write high-quality, maintainable, and scalable code
  • Work at all phases of the software development lifecycle (planning, design, implementation, deployment, and support)
  • Increase the velocity of continuous integration and minimize the complexity of managing dependencies
  • Build robust infrastructure to support new services and products
Required Technical and Professional Expertise
  • 5+ years of post-academic experience in a software engineering role
  • 2+ years building NodeJS applications with Javascript, Typescript, MySQL/PostgreSQL, Docker
  • Knowledge of software architecture and design patterns
  • Experience with continuous software integration and deployment
  • Good grasp on unit testing and automation testing. We take product quality very seriously
  • Good understanding of Git
  • Experience with agile development methodology
  • Fluent in English
Nice-to-have
  • Already built event driven architectures
  • You experienced DDD, CQRS, Event Sourcing, Clean/Hexagonal architecture
  • You are a software craftsman
  • Knowledge of cloud AWS
  • You are interested in finance and blockchain
